display.title: Acquire: modern_industrialization:gravichestplate
description: Uses advanced superconductor technology to invert the gravitational field around the player wearing it.
It uses EU, and can be charged by right-clicking a block that can output energy.
Note that the current GSP technology grants fly and prevents fall damage, but it does not protected against other kinds of damage.

subtitle.text: Uses advanced superconductor technology to invert the gravitational field around the player wearing it.
